Note:  A primary activity refers to an individual's main activity. Primary eating & drinking includes Eating and drinking (110101) and Eating and drinking as part of job (050202). Associated activities are Waiting associated with eating & drinking (110201) and Travel related to eating & drinking (181101). Travel times not included except in associated activities.
Source: USDA, Economic Research Service, using data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics’ 2016 American Time Use Survey (ATUS) and Eating and Health Module.
